column4: hey guys got a huge problem, i got a panasoni cf-27(has a messed windows... im trying to install ubuntu, but wen i turn it on i only see the f2 to go into setup, nothing to boot from cd drive?
o, and the cd drive is external
go to bios and configure it to boot from cdrom
maybe your computer can't boot from external CD roms then, you'll have to look at your user manual to see what options you have for booting the machine.  not really an ubuntu problem
